DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Multicenter Phase 2 Window Opportunity Study Evaluating Ganetespib Women With Breast Cancer

Documented HER2 hormonal receptor status per protocol , ER/PR+ patient must refractory least one prior hormonal treatment . ECOG Performance status 01 . Measurable disease per RECIST ( 1.1 ) .
